name: 職場英文
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習◎限大三大四修習
goals: Students are expected to actively participate in various forms of in-class practice including simulation, role play, pair work, group discussion, and oral presentation in order to enhance effective communicative abilities in occupational situations.
syllabus:
**Course Description:**

This course is aimed to improve students’ language skills and professional competencies in the following areas: (1) To strengthen the learners’ employment of professional English communication skills (2) To acquaint them with fundamental career-related business knowledge and concepts and (3) To introduce and familiarize the learners with career applications of English-related job demands and duties. Overall, the course is designed to enhance students’ occupational skills as well as  integrated English-language skills and/or for professional pursuits in business industries or the education fields of English for Specific Purposes (ESP). (Please kindly note that this course contains an 18-hour field learning component.)  

**Grading Criteria:**

*   Attendance, class participation & in-class exercises 20%
*   A case study (according to the suggested list): 15%
*   On-the-site learning, professional speeches and associated task: 35%
*   1 quiz 10%
*   Final-project presentation 20%
